abstract: Comprehensive performance optimization guide for TypeScript applications, designed for AI agents and LLMs. Contains 45 rules across 8 categories, prioritized by impact from critical (type system performance, compiler configuration) to incremental (advanced patterns). Each rule includes detailed explanations, real-world examples comparing incorrect vs. correct implementations, and specific impact metrics to guide automated refactoring and code generation. Updated for TypeScript 5.5+ (isolatedDeclarations) and 5.8+ (erasableSyntaxOnly).
